_json.title: Grey wash on furniture. How to restore old furniture.
_json.gridTitle: Grey wash on furniture. How to restore old furniture.
_json.description:
⚡️Save and Share this tutorial and follow @click2restore⚡️

How I did Grey wash on these vintage nightstands⬇️

⚡️ Mix 2:4 parts of paint: water so that you have a runny paint
 • ⚡️ apply with a brush on sanded and clean wood
 • ⚡️ wipe off immediately 

⚡️let it dry before applying clear coat 

Step by step detailed tutorial will be available this week on my YouTube Channel

#click2restore #greywash #furnituremakeovers #diyreels #paintedfurnitureideas #howtopaint
